text: Filibacter limicola is a bacterium. Filibacter limicola is the only species of the genus Filibacter. It is gram-positive. The species is aerob: It needs oxygen. It is filamentous and composed of more than one cells. The cells are curved or straight. It is a gliding bacterium. == References == == Other websites == * List of Prokaryotic names with Standing in Nomenclature (LPSN) Category:Gram-positive bacteria
title: Filibacter limicola
